-e ---

𓌃 #MD מדע MATTER™ mot/word MWD￫WRT mówić

𓂋 PIE wer "speak, call" in word, vardas 𓂋 𓈖 warn ⲣⲁⲛ "name" 𓂋 PIE wer "be/make wary / aware " in wehr 𓁹 ὁράω οὖρος watch ὤρα care guard

𒀀𒉿𒀀𒀜 a-wa-a-at a'word 𒀀𒉿𒀀𒀜 mu-wa-a-at mot 𒀀𒉿𒀀𒀜 command

𒀀𒈠𒌅 a-ma-tu matter, word
⇔
𒀀𒈠𒊒 a-ma-ru to see

𒈬𒌁 mu-ter mutter, utter
𒀀𒆳 a-mot word ⇔ cry

𒅗 INIM nomen #awātum “noun, word” <> nam 𒉆

𒀀𒉿𒀀𒀜 𒈪𒊭𒊑𒅎 ᵐawât mīšarim 𒀀𒉿𒀀𒀜 𒈪𒊭𒊑𒅎 righteous commands @ Mose
